availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Perry County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Campbell and Hannah Campbell. Resident of Perry County in 1850. Laborer in Perry County in 1860. Served in the 8th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as a corporal and sergeant from January 15, 1862 to November 17, 1864. Promoted to the rank of sergeant on June 1, 1862. Served in the Perry County Militia (Kentucky National Legion) as captain in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Perry County, District 1, p. 410A.
